home_title: Simplify the management of your end-of-study projects with our PFE application from the Faculty of Hassan 2 in Casablanca
home_body: Welcome to your end-of-study project (PFE) management space for the Faculty of Hassan 2 in Casablanca. This application is designed to facilitate the coordination and management of PFEs for students and teachers. We are proud to be able to offer this tool to improve the quality of PFEs and facilitate communication between the parties concerned. Welcome to our application, we hope it will meet your needs for PFE management.
